<template>
  <!-- <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
   <v-row
        align="center"
        class="mx-0"
      >
  <v-card class="cardA">
    
    <v-card-actions>
        
      <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
        <v-text-field
          v-model="name"
          :rules="nameRules"
          label="Username"
          required
        ></v-text-field>

        <v-text-field
          v-model="password"
          :rules="passwordRules"
          label="Password"
          required
        ></v-text-field>

        <v-btn color="success" class="mr-4" router to="/AdminOne">
          Login
        </v-btn>
      </v-form>
      
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
   </v-row>
</v-container> -->
  <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
    <v-row align="center" justify="center">
      <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="6">
        <v-card class="cardA" outlined height="200px" width="60%">
          <v-container>
            <v-layout row wrap>
              <v-row>
                <v-col align-self="center">
                    <v-card-title>Student Admission Management System (SAMS)</v-card-title>
                    <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-actions>
                    <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
                      <v-text-field
                        v-model="name"
                        :rules="nameRules"
                        label="Username"
                        required
                      ></v-text-field>

                      <v-text-field
                        v-model="password"
                        :rules="passwordRules"
                        label="Password"
                        required
                      ></v-text-field>

                      <v-btn color="primary" class="mr-4" elevation="20" width="200" height="40" router to="/AdminOne">
                        Login
                      </v-btn>
                    </v-form>
                  </v-card-actions>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-layout>
          </v-container>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "HomeView",
  data: () => ({
    valid: true,
    name: "",
    nameRules: [
      (v) => !!v || "Name is required",
      (v) => (v && v.length <= 10) || "Name must be less than 10 characters",
    ],
    password: "",
    passwordRules: [
      (v) => !!v || "Password is required",
      (v) => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || "Password invalid",
    ],
  }),

  methods: {
    validate() {
      this.$refs.form.validate();
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.cardA {
    background: rgba(245, 250, 255, 0.7);
    background: white;
    box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
   
}
</style>
